Title: Relates to permitting licensees authorized to sell liquor at retail for consumption off the premises to sell additional related items
Summary: Relates to permitting licensees authorized to sell liquor at retail for consumption off the premises to sell additional related items including gift baskets, glassware, accessories, novelty clothing, liquor candy, gift bags and books.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the alcoholic beverage control law, in relation to permitting licensees authorized to sell liquor at retail for consumption off the premises to sell additional related items
